stripped_text: Lose click: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trash 1 installed program. Subroutine Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 brain damage.
text: Lose [click]: Break 1 subroutine on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trash 1 installed program. [subroutine] Trace[1]. If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and do 1 brain damage.
title: Ichi 1.0
